name: Goblin Defenders: Steel‘n’ Wood
description: Battle hordes of monsters in Goblin Defenders: Steel 'n' Wood!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.6 GHZ processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB video card, OpenGL 1.5 or later DirectX: Version 8.1 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: DirectX 8.1 or later
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 3 GHZ processor or better Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB video card, OpenGL 1.5 or later DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: DirectX 9.0 or later

reviews.review_text: This is an interesting game from a certain point of view. I enjoyed playing it, does have a special graphic and great game mechanics, the overall sound is good. Keeps you entertained and satisfied.

I'm fine with simple games. I'm ok with mobile ports. I'm not ok with mobile ports that frequently crash and have a few really silly typos like 'amd' instead of 'and'.   The game itself is the most lackluster of tower defense. Better alternatives can be found for free on almost any flash game site out there. Even at under £1 it doesn't feel worth it.
